description: Fisheries and Oceans Canada and the Canadian Coast Guard has a requirement for the fabrication and supply of 1 (one) 10.0 to 11.0m Aluminum RHIBs built in accordance with Annex A – Technical Statement of Requirement (TSOR) and Annex F – Bidder questions and Canada Responses. The boat must be delivered on or before February 1, 2024.
full_summary:
trăm#Government Tender Announcement
==============================

### Tender Title
----------------

**Fabrication and Supply of 10.0 to 11.0m Aluminum RHIBs**

### Contract Details
-------------------

* **Contract Reference Number**: WS3917218055-Doc3920918179
* **Amendment Number**: 2
* **Publication Date**: 2023-03-30
* **Tender Closing Date**: 2023-05-11T14:00:00 (Expired)
* **Expected Contract Start Date**: 2023-04-24

### Procurement Information
-------------------------

* **Procurement Category**: Goods (GD)
* **Procurement Method**: Competitive - Open Bidding
* **Trade Agreements**: Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* **Regions of Opportunity**: N/A
* **Regions of Delivery**: Northwest Territories

### Contracting Entity
---------------------

* **Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)**
* **Address**: 11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau, QC K1A 0S5, Canada

### End User Entity
-----------------

* **Fisheries and Oceans Canada**
* **Address**: 200 Kent Street, Ottawa, ON K1A 0E6, Canada

### Contact Information
------------------------

* **Name**: Jason Smith, SPAC/PSPC
* **Email**: jason.smith@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca
* **Phone**: N/A
* **Fax**: N/A
* **URL for Notice**: [http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/15860532?extsite=MTU4NjA1MzJfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==](http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/15860532?extsite=MTU4NjA1MzJfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==)

### Tender Description
-------------------------

Fisheries and Oceans Canada and the Canadian Coast Guard require the fabrication and supply of one (1) 10.0 to 11.0m aluminum RHIB, conforming to Annex A – Technical Statement of Requirement (TSOR) and Annex F – Bidder questions and Canada Responses. The boat must be delivered on or before February 1, 2024. This procurement is conditionally limited to Canadian goods.
